functions.name: calculate_working_cap_reserve_for_year
functions.description: Calculate the cash from working capital reserve for a given year

cases.body: WorkingCap * ( (get(fixed_cost, i) + get(feedstock_cost, i) + get(other_raw_material_cost, i) + get(variable_cost, i)) - (get(fixed_cost, i-1) + get(feedstock_cost, i-1) + get(other_raw_material_cost, i-1) + get(variable_cost, i-1)) )

functions.name: get_working_cap_reserve_rows
functions.description: Get the rows for the working capital reserve

functions.name: get_working_cap_reserve_column
functions.description: Get the column for the working capital reserve
